name: Rizzoli & Isles (Season 1)
summary:
本剧根据《纽约时报》畅销书排行榜上榜作者Tess Gerritsen（其父是中国移民）的系列悬疑侦探小说改编，讲述波士顿女侦探JaneRizzoli和法医Maura Isles合作侦破连环谋杀案的故事。由于TessGerritsen本身是个医生，大学还学过人类学，因此对案件侦破过程中医学细节的描述极为详尽准确，这也是她的罪案小说的最大特点。
TNT很擅长描写强势女性形象，其在播的《罪案终结者》（The Closer）、《格蕾丝的救赎》（Saving Grace）是当今女性导向剧集的引导者。《妙女神探》继承了TNT的这一传统。女侦探Jane Rizzoli（AngieHarmon扮演）是一位意志十分坚强的女性，在男性为主的警察世界里从来就不服输。法医Maura Isles（SashaAlexander扮演）的性格相对内向，但也不是传统型的「淑女」－－她喜欢和尸体打交道，爱情生活却一塌糊涂。从某种意义上来说，Jane像是《格蕾丝的救赎》中的GraceHanadarko，而Maura像是《识骨寻踪》中的TemperanceBrennan。Jane和 Maura是一对绝佳组合－－要追踪一个狡猾的凶犯，你需要Jane这样既细心又有高超侦破技巧的侦探；但是要了解线索与线索之间的关联，从而揭开谋杀背后的科学之谜，你需要Maura这样的法医。

eps.name: See One. Do One. Teach One
eps.desc: The episode starts as Jane Rizzoli and Maura Isles investigate the murder of a husband and wife in their prestigious home, but when the signature leads back to the killer that traumatized Rizzoli, she decides to stay at Isles' house until the killer is found. The next day, Rizzoli is told that the murderer has escaped from a hospital before starting surgery. That night Rizzoli gets a call that some one has ransacked her apartment. When she gets there, a person dressed as a coroner lures her into his van, a man comes out of a body bag in the van and stuns her, then the first man injects her with a solution. She wakes up with her hands, and feet tied. Later, she escapes and kills the first man and gets revenge on the second.

eps.name: Boston Strangler Redux
eps.desc: In the middle of a baseball game, between Boston Police Department and the Drug Unit, a body is dropped in the middle of the field. Along with the body in the field, Frankie finds a part to a tire, which he thinks to be part of the car. Maura tells Jane that she needs to be more nice to Frankie, Jane confesses that she'd love to help Frankie make detective but he's not ready. Back at the station Korsak finds out that he was passed up for the Sergeant for Joey (Donnie Wahlberg), an old rival of Jane's. While getting ready for a family dinner, Angela confesses that she thinks Frank needs Frankie to be part of Rizzoli & Sons. She wants Jane to tell him all of the things that she missed. Before Angela can finish Jane gets called in for another strangling victim. Maura and Jane are both worried, because its the second strangling in one day. While finding the identities of their victims, Korsak believes that the Boston Strangler is back, and that he wasn't really caught like everyone believed. During dinner with her date, Maura begins to analyze her date, and diagnoses him with Marfans Syndrome, when he hears this he runs off. When Jane pitches the idea that the Boston Stranger is back to Joey he says that it isn't true, and it's a copy cat killer. Korsak and Jane go investigate the stranglers case, and go visit an old detective (Brian Dennehy) that was on the case. Maura tries to help Frost get over his fear of dead people, by doing to autopsy with him. With a case of twist and turns Jane and Korsak find out that it was Mackie, who was killing the women. When Jane goes to find him, he has Maura held captive. Maura then stabs him with a scapel and Jane knocks him down with a baseball bat.
